titles.title: To clarify the boundaries of the John H. Chafee Coast Barrier Resources System Cedar Keys Unit P25 on Otherwise Protected Area P25P.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans Discharged.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 108-641.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 385.

action.text: Mr. Radanovich moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3056.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/30/2004--Public Law. Replaces the map depicting the northernmost area of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System unit designated as Coastal Barrier Resources System Cedar Keys Unit P25/P25P (which is one of two maps subtitled "P25/P25P" included in the set of maps entitled "Coastal Barrier Resources System" referred to in the Coastal Barrier Resources Act) with another map relating to that unit entitled "John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Cedar Keys Unit P25/P25P," dated February 9, 2004.
